title: The Fantasy Trip (TFT) Essentials
description:
Essentials for running/playing Metagaming\&#039;s The Fantasy Trip. 

Essentially, GURPS is a reimagining of TFT.

This torrent includes only the core rules (in several versions). There are loads of house rules on the net; they are not included.

The files are mostly PDFs.

Filelist:
Rules:
	TFT_Advanced_Melee_OCR.pdf	Detailed combat rules
	TFT_Wizard_OCR.pdf	Basic Magic Rules
	TFT_Lords_of_Underearth.pdf	Mass Combat Rules
	TFT_Advanced_Wizard.pdf	Detailed Magic Rules
	TFT_Dragons_of_Underearth.pdf	Basic Magic, Combat, and Roleplay rules
	TFT_Melee_OCR.pdf	Basic Combat Rules
	TFT_In_The_Labyrinth_OCR.pdf	Roleplay rules
Counters
	TFTCounters.pdf	decent spread
	bravos2.pdf
	outsourcedmonsters.pdf
	moria.pdf
	tpthugs.pdf
	bravos1.pdf
	monsters1.pdf
	TFT_Melee_counters.pdf	Basic Melee countersheet
	alternateearthers.pdf
	monsters2.pdf
	travellers.pdf	Sci Fi countersheet
	hymenopterans.pdf
	TFT_Wizard_counters.pdf	Basic Melee countersheet
TFT_History.rtf	Overview of the game\&#039;s publication
TFT_Melee_map.pdf	the basic map; should be on legal.
designnt_files	The designers Notes image files
	img53.gif
	img51.gif
	img54.gif
	img52.gif
designnt.htm	The designer\&#039;s notes
Read_Me.rtf	this file
